ORIGAM Documentation : FileExists

Created by Petr Hrehorovský, last modified on Jan 24, 2019

Returns true if file exists on the given path.

NAMESPACE

xmlns:fs="http://xsl.origam.com/filesystem"

SYNTAX

bool FileExists(string path)

EXAMPLE

Stylesheet
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"
	xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions"
	xmlns:date="http://exslt.org/dates-and-times" 
	xmlns:fs="http://xsl.origam.com/filesystem"
	exclude-result-prefixes="AS date fs">
	<xsl:template match="/">
		<xsl:value-of select="fs:FileExists('c:\\huhu.txt')"/>
	</xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>
